quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.
author: Eric Thomas

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: A man can be as great as he wants to be. If you believe in yourself and have the courage, the determination, the dedication, the competitive drive and if you are willing to sacrifice the little things in life and pay the price for the things that are worthwhile, it can be done.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, but kept going no matter what.
author: Spryte Loriano

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. STOP when you are DONE.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Success… seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
author: Unknown

quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier, wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
author: Washington Irving

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore, Dream, Discover.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says “I’m possible”!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsh

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential… these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
author: John Wooden

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Give me a stock clerk with a goal, and I will give you a man who will make history. Give me a man without a goal, and I will give you a stock clerk.
author: J.C. Penny

quote: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
author: Unknown

quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no help at all.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: . Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: I do not have superior intelligence or faultless looks. I do not captivate a room or run a mile under six minutes. I only succeeded because I was still working after everyone else went to sleep.
author: Greg Evans

quote: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed.
author: Ray Goforth

quote: What’s the point of being alive if you don’t at least try to do something remarkable.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won’t feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: How does one become a butterfly? You must want to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.
author: Trina Paulus

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life—think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: There will be obstacles. There will be doubters. There will be mistakes. But with hard work, there are no limits.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Nothing great will ever be achieved without great men, and men are great only if they are determined to be so.  For glory gives herself only to those who have always dreamed of her.
author: Charles De Gaulle

quote: You got a dream, you gotta protect it. People can’t do something themselves, they wanna tell you, you can’t do it. If you want something, go get it. Period.
author: Will Smith

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light that fire under you, chances are it will burn very briefly.
author: Stephen R. Covey

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it’s always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Nothing great ever came that easy.
author: Kresley Cole

quote: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don’t really matter.
author: Francis Chan

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: The greatest achievement was at first, and for a time, but a dream.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them.
author: Unknown

quote: Great things come to those who don’t wait.
author: Unknown

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: People who succeed have momentum. The more they succeed, the more they want to succeed, and the more they find a way to succeed. Similarly, when someone is failing, the tendency is to get on a downward spiral that can even become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down “happy”. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life.
author: John Lennon

quote: Ones best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The fishing is best where the fewest go, and the collective insecurity of the world makes it easy for people to hit home runs while everyone else is aiming for base hits. There is just less competition for bigger goals. If you are insecure, guess what? The rest of the world is, too. Do not overestimate the competition and underestimate yourself. You are better than you think.
author: Timothy Ferris

quote: It’s not about time, it’s about choices. How are you spending your choices?
author: Beverly Abamo

quote: You will succeed because most people are lazy.
author: Unknown

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
author: Unknown

quote: I find that when you have a real interest in life and a curious life, that sleep is not the most important thing.
author: Martha Stewart

quote: There are no great men. Just great challenges which ordinary men, out of necessity, are forced by circumstance to meet.
author: Admiral William Frederick Halsey Jr.

quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Some people develop a wish bone where their back bone should be.
author: Unknown

quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

quote: No matter how hard the past is, you can always begin again.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Infuse your life with action. Don’t wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen… yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Christopher Columbus

quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: There are two primary choices in life; to accept conditions as they exist, or to accept the responsibility for changing them.
author: Dennis Waitely

quote: More often than not, successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy.
author: Olaf Isachsen

quote: The greatest challenge we need to overcome is the sluggishness that keeps us from starting what needs to be done. Even the greatest journey starts with a small step in the right direction. However, we need to be willing to make this initial effort. But once we have started walking towards our dreams it is important to never stop, no matter what happens. Only with great care and determination will we be able to realize our visions. In fact, our focus on our dreams needs to be laser-sharp. Only if we are willing to make a great effort we will be rewarded with the most astonishing and exciting gratifications.
author: So have a vision, get up and start pursuing it until you succeeded.
